rounds.category: IT CAME TO THEM IN A DREAM

clues.text: This Beatle woke up with the tune for "Yesterday" in his head, but "I couldn't have written it because I just dreamed it"
This director created "The Terminator" after a nightmare about a metallic figure emerging from a fire
This "Golden Bear" turned around his golf game by using a new grip the way he did in a dream
After a feverish nightmare about cannibals, Elias Howe is said to have had a breakthrough in his invention of this device
This woman dreamed a "pale student of unhallowed arts kneeling beside the thing he had put together" & a novel was born
Adjective for a blade that has just been honed
Homo sapiens means "man the" this 4-letter word
Preceded by "un", it means mysterious; we want the 5-letter version meaning clever
A particular skill or aptitude, or a person with an I.Q. higher than 150
Cervelle au beurre noisette is this French dish, served in butter
'Twas 2 days before Christmas in 1823 that the poem "A Visit from" him was published anonymously in a New York newspaper
This Stevenson classic is divided into 6 parts including "The Old Buccaneer" & "Captain Silver"
In 1863 he published a novel about "The Cossacks", who also get plenty of mention in his next, more epic, work
His adventure novel "Une Ville Flottante", "A Floating City", takes place on a steamship, not under the sea
His first book of poems, "The Black Riders" was published in 1895, the same year as his "Red Badge of Courage"
A bomb nicknamed Little Boy was dropped on Hiroshima; the bomb dropped on Nagasaki had this nickname
Those born under this fourth sign are nicknamed "moon children"
This NFL field is called "The Frozen Tundra"; the 1967 Green Bay-Dallas title game was played there at -13 degrees
This bird is mentioned in one of Louisiana's state nicknames
In "The Final Problem", Holmes tells Watson that Professor Moriarty is this, for his ability to organize evil
This lady duetted with Ariana Grande on the 2020 hit "Rain On Me"
At the end of the movie "Grease", they duet on "You're The One That I Want"
Colbie Caillat & Jason Mraz sang "I'm" this "I'm in love"
"Somebody That I Used To Know" is by Kimbra & this one-named guy
She & Charlie Puth sang about how "We Don't Talk Anymore"
The name of this dynasty that ruled in Europe from the 1200s to the 1900s came from the family's ancestral "Hawk's Castle"
King of Judea, he built the palace-fortress of Masada & rebuilt the temple of Jerusalem
The Battle of Castillon & the capture of Bordeaux in 1453 effectively ended this war
Following WWII this Japanese emperor declared he was not a living god & renounced his divinity
This emperor of Ethiopia was deposed in 1974 & died under mysterious circumstances a year later
This nickname for New York City was used by Washington Irving; Bruce Wayne put it before "City"
Poughkeepsie is "The Queen City of" this river
Slowly I turned... to this "Honeymoon Capital of the World"
Second only to New York City in population, this western port is the "Nickel City"
Sharing its name with a European capital, it was known as "Copper City" for its production of that metal
A dog command, or to make someone feel better via medicine
Stop the car, or smash to bits
To favor one position over another, or released an exasperated sound
To twist hair, or made a sound like a donkey
Join a gathering, or deliver justice
For water, it's 100 degrees Celsius
In 1958 this trade magazine launched the Hot 100, the gold standard for ranking popular songs
This NBA center's 1962 scoring record of 100 points in a single game still stands today
In a non leap year, the 100th day falls on this date
The oldest person ever to serve as a U.S. senator, he was 100 when he retired in 2003
Kenner's "Star Wars" action figures have included this droid complete with pop-up lightsaber
A Disney doll of this "Tangled" character comes with a brush
You can get a 12" plush version of this Bullwinkle pal, which must be nearly life size
This brother doll joined his sister in 1920
In the 1980s, this "Brite" was the name of an animated series & of a doll clad in stripes of red, blue, yellow & other colors
"The Donut" by Michael Krondl says the treat became popular with this profession back when all-night food options were few
Milk & powdered sugar are Mark Bittman's 2 ingredients for this 5-letter substance that covers many a Krispy Kreme donut
In Israel, jelly donuts are the traditional food during this winter holiday
Your basic donut shop donut is made with yeast; this crispy type named for a different treat uses baking powder
The doughboys of the WWI U.S. Army were grateful for the "Donut Lassies" of this "Army"
Wheezing is a common symptom of this lung disorder; a global initiative brings awareness of it annually on the first Tuesday in May
Motrin is a brand of this nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to treat fever & muscle aches
Estrogen alone or along with progesterone is what menopausal women get as this therapy, HRT for short
The bone marrow doesn't produce enough blood cells in the aplastic type of this disease
Whether you get a DT vaccine or a TD vaccine, you are being protected from tetanus & this infectious disease

rounds.text: In 2022 she became the first woman to have a Billboard Top 10 album in 5 decades starting with the 1980s
